name: car_rental_management
description: This project was developed for the selection process at RentCars. It's an implementation of a CRUD application for managing a car rental company. The application is a full web application with a front-end, back-end, and database. The front-end web page consumes the endpoints of the back-end API and performs operations in the database. It can handle any of the basic CRUD operations: Create, Read, Update, and Delete.
author: Thiago Frois
